attributes.title: Glitches
attributes.review: It constantly glitches and freezes to the point I can’t use it

attributes.title: I HATE THIS
attributes.review: It’s racist, homophobic, misogynistic and just all around horrible. The setup it terrible and all he’s trying to do is show everyone there are a few people of color and women who support him, I HATE HIM.

attributes.title: No thank you.
attributes.review: I downloaded the app so I could get my tickets to attend rallies and show my support to Donald but the app did not work and shortly after it hacked my entire phone. Really Donald?

attributes.title: What’s happening???
attributes.review:
So as a 52 year old white woman, I decided to get this app to support our AMAZING president! But... when I opened the app a giant Cheeto?? Kept appearing?? What? Honestly such a disappointment. Obviously Trump still has my vote! Trump 2020!

On a gravestone 🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️✨🌈

attributes.title: Terrible service 👁👄👁
attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking that I would get the free donuts that I was promised, all I got was a donut hole😔 don’t let what happened to me happen to you 😔#disappointing #scam

attributes.title: Fraud
attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible. The worst app I’ve ever seen and invested in. I will never get this app again and I do not recommend it to ANYONE. Please stay safe and stay away from the app
